price: Зар ћеш себе да упропастиш зато што они неће да поверују?!
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
